title: Mini-Ep 229: Dolly Parton Approved
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 229: Dolly Parton Approved
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree reminisce about spending time with each other IRL and discuss selling secondhand clothing. Then, listeners send in responses to the caller concerned about taking baths during the drought, check-in on Kate’s fountain pen journey, and ques...
description:
Kate and Doree reminisce about spending time with each other IRL and discuss selling secondhand clothing. Then, listeners send in responses to the caller concerned about taking baths during the drought, check-in on Kate’s fountain pen journey, and question what the teen tokkers are using to wash their face.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow them on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
